medium: Grayish white nephrite with brown markings
title: Rhyton
description: Carved with a dragon\'s head at the base, with another dragon climbing at the side to form the handle, the grey-green stone with brown andblack markings, crudely carved with archaistic scrollwork. Flaw chip at rim. Weatherd at one side more greatly than the other.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and Gift of the Thomas Barlow Walker Foundation
